taskbody.context: Use this procedure to identify and remove unused images.

step.cmd: Log in to the master host .
Identify the images associated with the installed version of serviced.
Display the serviced images in the local repository.
step.stepresult:
Example result (edited to fit): REPOSITORY TAG IMAGE ID zenoss/serviced-isvcs v40 88cd6c24cc82 zenoss/serviced-isvcs v 0aab5a2123f2 zenoss/isvcs-zookeeper v3 46fa0a2fc4bf zenoss/isvcs-zookeeper v 0ff3b3117fb8

step.stepxmp: Replace Image-ID with the image ID of an image for a previous version. docker rmi Image-ID
step.info: Repeat this command for each unused image.
